meanings.definition: Relating to or located on the outer layer of the skin.
meanings.sent1: The epidermal layer protects our body from harm.
meanings.sent2: Healthy skin has a smooth epidermal surface.
meanings.sent3: I always imagine tiny epidermal soldiers guarding my skin.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an epidermal shield against negativity.
meanings.sent5: The sunburn made the epidermal layer painfully evident.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or resembling the epidermis.
meanings.sent1: The lotion had an epidermal effect on her skin.
meanings.sent2: The epidermal cells play a crucial role in skin regeneration.
meanings.sent3: The epidermal pattern on the leaf looked like a secret code.
meanings.sent4: His words had an epidermal impact on her emotions.
meanings.sent5: The epidermal resemblance between the twins was uncanny.
